name: luffy
description: A secure file sharing bot using Telegram.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from my.telegram.org

DATABASE_NAME.description: The name of the database for storing bot data

DB_CHANNEL_ID.description: Channel ID where files will be stored

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL_2.description: Second mandatory subscription channel (set 0 if not used)

CHANNEL_LINK.description: Link to the first mandatory subscription channel

CHANNEL_LINK_2.description: Link to the second mandatory subscription channel (leave empty if not used)

DEVELOPER_LINK.description: Link to the developer's Telegram profile or bot support

SUPPORT_LINK.description: Link to the support group or chat for the bot

BOT_NAME.description: The display name of your bot

MODIJI_API_KEY.description: API key for external services (if applicable)

WEB_SERVER.description: Set to True for hosting on platforms like Render/Koyeb; False if using local hosting

PING_URL.description: The health check or ping URL for keeping the bot active

PING_TIME.description: Interval (in seconds) to ping the bot to prevent sleeping

ADMIN_IDS.description: List of admin Telegram user IDs who have control over the bot

PRIVACY_MODE.description: Set to 'on' for restricting users to copy or forward the content

AUTO_DELETE_TIME.description: Time (in minutes) after which a file will be automatically deleted after being accessed
